Welcome!

18 Sep 2015

Hi, I'm Jerry Bao, a recent graduate from University of California, Berkeley with a degree in Computer Science. I'm an avid learner and self-starter; I like to work on projects that interest me in my spare time, which you can find in the Projects section. In addition, you can take a look at my resume, scrutinize my work on GitHub, or connect with me through LinkedIn. I look forward to hearing from or connecting with you!

This website is still under construction and will probably go through a lot of change in the coming months.
